location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 4/39 Kuwait State: Criticisms against the Sheikh and Government'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 14; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains articles from the Arabic-language press that all concern the Ruler of Kuwait, Shaikh Ahmad al-Jaber al-Sabah.The articles - most of which are critical of the ruler and his government - are from the following publications: al-Arab, Rose al-Yusuf, al-Baridand al-Nas.Except for one, an original Arabic article published in al-Arabon folio 3, the articles appear only in English translation.
